content.p: The Institute of Screen Industries Research (ISIR) bridges the gap between academia and industry, fostering innovation and collaboration within film, television, gaming, and digital media. We are committed to advancing sustainable creative, technological, and business dimensions of the screen industries, with equality, diversity and inclusion for the workforce. Our work encompasses cutting-edge research, industry partnerships, and knowledge exchange, all aimed at supporting the growth and evolution of the screen industries. By leveraging the latest advancements in technology and creative practice, we are helping to shape the future of storytelling and screen production in a dynamic and rapidly changing landscape. Whether you're a researcher, industry professional, or student, we invite you to engage with our projects, events, and initiatives that are driving the next wave of innovation in this exciting field.
